actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-43.

official_title: A resolution to amend rule XXV relative to open and closed sessions of committees.

summary.text: Provides that meetings for the transaction of business of each standing committee of the Senate, other than for the conduct of hearings, shall be open to the public except during closed sessions for marking up bills or for voting or when the committee by majority vote orders a closed session. Provides that any such closed session may be open to the public if the committee by rule or by majority vote so determines.

titles.title: A resolution to amend rule XXV relative to open and closed sessions of committees.
